title: Support ASP.NET Blazor Web Assembly Components
body:
**Description of Change**

Add support for Blazor on Web Assembly.

**Bugs Fixed**

<!-- Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR. -->

-  #1219
-  #1194

**Getting Started**

The build for this PR has been pushed to out preview feed: https://aka.ms/skiasharp-eap/index.json

You will also need the RC 2 .NET SDK:
 - Windows: https://dotnetcli.azureedge.net/dotnet/Sdk/6.0.100-rc.2.21478.37/dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21478.37-win-x64.exe
 - macOS: https://dotnetcli.azureedge.net/dotnet/Sdk/6.0.100-rc.2.21478.37/dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21478.37-osx-x64.pkg  
   > note: macos installer says it failed to install, but it actually did just fine. You can also use the script to install to avoid issues: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-install-script

All you need to do is install the `SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor` NuGet package!

```razor
<SKCanvasView PaintSurface="PaintMySurface" style="width:100px; height:100px" />
```

**🔥**
